DOC.brief_summary: The study design determine extent plant-based ingredient different food format affect blood glucose response healthy subject
DOC.criteria: Willing give consent participate study write ; Healthy male female subject , age ≥20 ≤50 yr age first screen visit ; Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥18 ≤ 25 kg/m2 ; Apparently healthy : medical condition might affect study measurement , judge study physician and/or measure questionnaire , and/or assess haematology , blood chemistry urinalysis ; Willing comply study protocol study ; Agreeing inform medically relevant personal testresults study physician ; Willing refrain drinking alcohol one day blood withdrawal ; Fasting blood glucose value volunteer ≥ 3.4 ≤ 6.1 mmol/litre ( i.e . 62110 mg/dl ) screening ; Haemoglobin level within clinically acceptable range ( male 12 17 gm/dL female 11 15 gm / dL ; inclusive ) Being employee Unilever CRO ; Chronic smoker , tobacco chewer drinker ; Participation biomedical study 3 month screen visit day study and/or participate biomedical study screen period ; Use medication interferes study measurement include vitamin , tonic ; Reported intense exercise ≥10 h/week ; Reported weight loss/gain ≥ 10 % body weight 6 month precede screen Blood donation 2 month prior screen ; Urine analysis show drug abuse ; Allergy food cosmetic ; If female , pregnant planning pregnancy study period ; If female , lactate lactate 6 week prestudy investigation and/or study period .
